item.title: Start Learning English!
item.description: Intro I don’t know how to start again to learn english. I have larned english since my shildhood, specifically since elementary school. From that I don’t confidence enough to my self. Until now I still have problem to speak english well. But it’s not a matter I hope. I still beliecve that language is not about how long I learn, but it’s about how long I train and use this language to my daily activity.
